amendment.description: To provide compensation and credit for retired pay purposes for maternity leave taken by members of the reserve components.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1693 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1693 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4195) To provide compensation and credit for retired pay purposes for maternity leave taken by members of the reserve components.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1693 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1693 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Moran to Amendment SA 2301.
